$.data()类型自动转换
	
	<div id="J_Obj" data-role="page" data-hidden="true" data-options='{"name":"John"}' data-weight="100">$.data()类型自动转换</div>
	
	var $obj = $("#J_Obj");
	console.log($obj.data("role") === "page");//String
	console.log($obj.data("hidden") === true);//Boolean
	console.log($obj.data("options").name === "John");//Object
	console.log($obj.data("weight") === 100);//Number
